Class ManagerView

java.lang.Object
views.ManagerView
public class ManagerView extends Object
View class that handles the display of manager-related functionalities. It provides methods for displaying project operations, officer registrations, applicant applications, and project details.

    Method

    displayApplicantApplications(List<Application> applications)

  • Method Details

    • showSelectHandledProjectMenu

      public static int showSelectHandledProjectMenu(Project project)
      Displays a menu for selecting manager operations for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project for which manager operations are being selected
      Returns:
      The choice selected by the manager

    • displayOfficerRegistrationsForApproval

      public static int displayOfficerRegistrationsForApproval(List<Registration> registrations, Project project)
      Displays officer registrations pending approval or rejection for a given project.
      Parameters:
      registrations - The list of registrations for the project
      project - The project associated with the registrations
      Returns:
      The selected registration number to approve/reject, or 0 to go back

    • promptApproveReject

      public static int promptApproveReject()
      Prompts the manager to approve or reject a registration.
      Returns:
      The action selected by the manager: 1 for approve, 2 for reject, 0 to cancel

    • displayRegistrationApprovedSuccess

      public static void displayRegistrationApprovedSuccess(String officerName)
      Displays a success message when an officer registration is approved.
      Parameters:
      officerName - The name of the officer whose registration was approved

    • displayRegistrationRejectedSuccess

      public static void displayRegistrationRejectedSuccess(String officerName)
      Displays a success message when an officer registration is rejected.
      Parameters:
      officerName - The name of the officer whose registration was rejected

    • displayRegistrationActionFailed

      public static void displayRegistrationActionFailed(String action)
      Displays an error message when a registration action fails.
      Parameters:
      action - The action (approve/reject) that failed

    • displayOfficerRegistrations

      public static int displayOfficerRegistrations(List<Registration> registrations)
      Displays a list of officer registrations and prompts the manager to approve/reject/withdraw registrations.
      Parameters:
      registrations - The list of officer registrations to be managed
      Returns:
      The selected registration number for action

    • displayApplicantApplications

      public static int displayApplicantApplications(List<Application> applications)
      Displays a list of applicant applications and prompts the manager to approve/reject/withdraw applications.
      Parameters:
      applications - The list of applications to be managed
      Returns:
      The selected application number for action

    • displayProjectDetails

      public static int displayProjectDetails(Project project)
      Displays project details and prompts the manager to edit project details such as name, location, visibility, and flat types.
      Parameters:
      project - The project whose details are to be managed
      Returns:
      The action selected for editing the project details
